title: Mind Games 2
desc:
Post 51
- Keep this card in your hand instead of playing it.
- At any time, ask someone for half of their money. If they DON'T ask how/why/adjacent things, play this card and steal half of their money.
- When you draw this card, it appears as (11) Mind Games in public. Only the holder will know it's true nature.
- A player cannot draw (51) Mind Games 2 if they own a copy of (11) Mind Games, or vice versa.
